snippet: The State Senate voted 20 to 14 Tuesday to override Gov. Mike Beebe’s veto of a bill that would establish the country’s most stringent limits on abortion, banning the procedure after 12 weeks of pregnancy.
abstract: Arkansas State Senate votes 20 to 14 to override Gov Mike Beebe's veto of a bill that would establish the country's most stringent limits on abortion, banning the procedure after 12 weeks of pregnancy.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate voted 20 to 14 Tuesday to override Gov. Mike Beebe’s veto of a bill that would establish the country’s most stringent limits on abortion, banning the procedure after 12 weeks of pregnancy.
